title: Free Orpheus
content:
Free Orpheus Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Baldur's Gate Reward

Free Orpheus is a Personal Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Free Orpheus can be acquired during Act 3. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Free Orpheus Objectives

Find a way to free Orpheus.

We found out that the Astral Prism is a prison for the githyanki prince Prpheus. The mind flayer that calls itself th
